::KitKat::

She had a bad feeling.  She had met this bot from the council.  Why 
would the council be concerned with the beast wars or Megatron unless 
something else was happeneing as well.  She looked at Drillbit, then 
to Phobia. She didn't like this feeling that was growing in her gut.  
her instincts were rarely wrong. She looked at Phobia. "Phobia, where 
are we meeting the others? Also, do any scanners here have the 
capability to find Megatron's signal.  Megatron has had enough time 
to get other bots to join him by now. I want to see if maybe Megatron 
has recuruited any other followers."
She had no idea why her instincts were screaming at her, but she 
couldn't ignore it.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>   "I know..but like I said we have lost all contact with cybertron. 
I fear 
> something horrible has happened."
